body_content.explanation: not having only one gender, or moving freely between genders:
examples: This is my friend Kay, and they are genderfluid.
The concept of being gender-fluid may seem odd to some, but it's an accepted part of many cultures around the world.

body_content.explanation: characteristic of or able to be used by anyone of any gender:
examples: He took a very genderfluid approach to casting for the film.
The designer debuted a new line of gender-fluid fashion.
The skincare company announced they were moving away from traditional women's cosmetics and wanted to be thought of as a gender-fluid brand.
